revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Olimex |model=A64-OLinuXino |revision=-1Gs16M |price=45 |est_release_date=June 2017 |manuf_country=Bulgaria |is_manuf=No |availability=currently shipping |type=single-board computer |flags=HDMI, MIPI DSI, LCD, Audio in (3.5mm), Audio out (3.5mm), LiPo battery connector, Micro SD Card slot, |pwr_v=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A64 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FV |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646Q-HYK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ9031RN |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP803;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;2;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;1;,,, 1.2MHz 2A Step Up Converter;Aerosemi;MT3608;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=Armbian, Android }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/A64/A64-OLinuXino/open-source-hardware Product page]
''"A64-OLinuXino-Lime2 Rev.D."'' is silkscreened on the board :(to right of the USB A connector). {{see also|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}}
*[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLinuXino#A64 ''OLinuXino A64'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A64-OLinuXino ''Olimex A64-OLinuXino'' on '''Linux-SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/06/06/a64-olinuxino-open-source-hardware-allwinner-a64-development-board-launched-for-50-euros/ ''A64-OLinuXino Open Source Hardware'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-allwinner-a64-hacker-board-runs-linux-or-android/ ''Open spec Allwinner A64 hacker board runs Linux or Android'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A64 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53) @1.2 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' MP2 *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM @ 672MHz • Samsung *Onboard Storage: 16MB NOR, TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG
===See also=== :;[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/open-source-hardware ''Olimex'' Products] • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Category:Community_Devices ''Olimex'' Devices] *[[Olimex OLinuXino-MAXI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MICRO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MINI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-NANO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) *[[Olimex A10-OLinuXino-Lime]] *[[Olimex A10s-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino WIFI]] *[[Olimex A13-SOM]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime]] :[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A20 MICRO 8GB]] *[[Olimex A20-SOM]] :[[Olimex A20-SOM204]] *[[Olimex A33-OLinuXino]] *[[Olimex A64-OLinuXino-1G]] *[[Olimex AM3352-SOM-EVB]] *[[Olimex ARM-USB-TINY-H]]
